description: Pebble object management - spherical components of clumps (overlapping spheres)
note: Pebbles are the spherical building blocks of clumps. They cannot exist independently and are always part of a clump.

functions.name: count
functions.description: Get total number of pebbles in the model. O(1) operation - very fast.

returns.description: Number of pebbles currently in the model

functions.name: find
functions.description: Find pebble by ID number. Returns None if pebble doesn't exist. Finding by ID is O(1) - very fast.

returns.description: Pebble object if found, None if ID doesn't exist

functions.name: inbox
functions.signature: itasca.clump.pebble.inbox(lower_bound: vec, upper_bound: vec, intersect: bool = True) -> tuple[Pebble, ...]
functions.description: Get a tuple of pebbles with extents intersecting a box. The extent is the axis-aligned bounding box of the pebble. If intersect=False, only pebbles with positions falling in the box are returned.

parameters.name: lower_bound
parameters.description: Lower bound of the box (x, y, z)

parameters.name: upper_bound
parameters.description: Upper bound of the box (x, y, z)

parameters.name: intersect
parameters.description: If True, return pebbles with extents intersecting box. If False, only pebbles with positions in box (default: True)

returns.description: Tuple of pebble objects in the specified box

functions.name: list
functions.description: Return an iterator over all pebbles in the model. Returns iterator (not list). Order not guaranteed. Use list(it.clump.pebble.list()) to create snapshot before modifying during iteration.

functions.name: maxid
functions.description: Get the maximum pebble ID currently in the model.

functions.name: near
functions.description: Find the closest pebble to a point. If radius is non-zero, only search within this radius.

parameters.name: point
parameters.description: Point to search from (x, y, z)

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Search radius. If 0.0, search entire model (default: 0.0)

returns.description: Closest pebble object, or None if no pebble found within radius
